name: Cubedoku: Wood Block Puzzle
description:
Cubedoku: Block Puzzle Sudoku is a perfect combination of the classic woodblock puzzles and sudoku. This brand new 9-in-1 block puzzle game offers a soothing and relaxing experience while also challenging your ability to think through problems and find solutions quicker.

The objective of Cubedoku: Block Puzzle Sudoku is straightforward. You need to match different-shaped blocks in horizontal, vertical, or designated 3x3 grids to clear them and aim for the highest score as much as possible. The more block formations you make, the more points you get. Simple enough. Once you get enough points, you will be rewarded coins to purchase for boosters.

While some of the puzzles might prove difficult, the relaxing music and sound effects in the background keep the experience chill. It’s best to think of it as a relaxing timewaster that subtly works on improving your mental acuity. Moreover, to keep things interesting, this game allows you to use some powerful boosters.

◉ HIGHLIGHT FEATURES
● A perfect combination of Block puzzle & Sudoku
● Clear the lines & squares to score
● Beat your high score and challenge other players
● Easily rotate the blocks
● Powerful booster: Use a hammer to destroy a 3x3 grid
● Free & easy to play - Hard to master
● Relaxing & Addictive

Carving out time and having a blast playing Cubedoku: Block Puzzle Sudoku - Wood Block Games now for free!
